Reviews.Content: stayed 4 nights starting prior reviews pretty reflects hotel location price affordable staff courteous accomdations bath clean 4th floor aware previously elevator hotel bit tiresome days solution lower floor prior reviews aware breakfast reservations bother breakfast simple coffee breakfast overpriced downside beds hard visible ac except hotel price fit

Reviews.Title: “Timing is everything!”

Reviews.Content: 3 friends denmark staying hotel wellsituated hotel basic clean worth reasonable price location guests unaware reserve halfhour breakfast slot arrived slot andor stayed considering limited space hotels attempt efficient encourage guests considerate breakfast time leave slots thumbs hotel

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable and near the centre”
Reviews.Author: smiliestef
Reviews.Content: stayed 2 nights february 2011 basic comfortable location near arriving airport easy cheap train centre ages hotel foot due arriving dead night breakfast choicethe hotel clean quiet stayed weather gorgeous stay recommend staying visit rome offer comfortable location hotel

Reviews.Title: “Placement, placement”
Reviews.Author: JR-Jelling
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights nice stay location fantastic short distances de fiori pantheon piazza navona piazza venezia morning breakfast bit hustle consideration romms system prebooking 50 persons waiting time remember italy staying italian 2 star hotel marriotts hiltons world reviews front desk unhelpful experience special ok class price

Reviews.Title: “Best at the Price”
Reviews.Author: Terpander
Reviews.Content: centrally located romes neighborhood black tiber five blocks pantheon six piazza navona extremely convenient run clean friendly helpful breakfast excellent lacks elevator charge prices dont mind stairs

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location”
Reviews.Author: Carolyn
Reviews.Content: hotel minutes campo de fiore pantheon piazza navona convenient bus service train station city choice location definitely budget hotel entrance flight stairs building larger flight stay prefer floor lobby tiny en suite bathroom basic shower sink toilet staff polite extremely helpful knowledgeable especially rosanna breakfast included theres access bbc world news tv

Reviews.Title: “Location was good, average hotel”

Reviews.Content: location hotel nice central major sites vatican museums major sites 1520 minute walk train station bags rome average lot space hang clothing staying breakfast included signup time slot day slot pretty smoothly food

Reviews.Title: “Reception deck was not a RECEPTIVE!”

Reviews.Content: hotel elevator medium priced clean comfortable location expect treated rudeness unfriendly clerks reception desk stayed 5 nights couldnt warm tried morning evening italian intrusion believe giving praise due dominic jewel evenings reception person smiling helpful thumbs dominic

Reviews.Content: located jewish ghetto traveler near kosher restaurants centrally located sites front desk wasnt nice depending day desk clerk pretty helpful elevator ac decent breakfast free access computer internet lobby

Reviews.Title: “Great location . . . terrible front desk service”

Reviews.Content: location hotel excellent terrible front desk service clerk exception hotel stay painful attempted pleasant werent special essentials painful staff help sit watch entrance else questions figure own motto clean lounging budget hotel breakfasts excellent gals prepared espressos served breakfasts sweethearts charming friendly lots fun elevators plan climbing lots stairs exercise lots luggage
